# mvabund

```{r include = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
library(mvabund)

# sites (rows) x species (columns) matrix
cyano.genus.mat <- t(as.matrix(otu_table(cyano.genus)))
cyano.mvabund <- mvabund(cyano.genus.mat)

sampdat <- data.frame(sample_data(cyano.genus))
sampdata.cyano <- data.frame(sampdat$Nitrate, sampdat$H2O2, sampdat$SRP, sampdat$pH, sampdat$DOC)

row.names(sampdata.cyano) <- sampdat$SampleID
row.names(cyano.mvabund) <- sampdat$SampleID

plot(cyano.mvabund)
cyan.nb <- manyglm(cyano.mvabund~sampdata.cyano$sampdat.Nitrate*sampdata.cyano$sampdat.SRP, family = "negative.binomial")

plot(cyan.nb, which=1)


coef(cyan.nb)
res <- residuals(cyan.nb)

qqnorm(res)
qqline(res, col = "red")
#plot.mvabund(cyano.mvabund, sampdata.cyano)
```
mvpart(data.matrix(cyano.genus.mat)~)
